name: Weapon Of Choice (itch)
description:
Follow the adventure of our frisky protagonist and aid him in becoming the strongest hero of them all.  What does it mean to be the strongest? Well, just be careful! Not everything is as it seems. 

Controls: WASD + Spacebar, (press Spacebar at the boy at the beginning of the game to start interactions)

Jan - Coding

Kiri - Art (https://tinyjustice24.itch.io/)

Seb - Coding

Steph - Writing
